Articles.Content:
Hi there.

I KNOW ! Posts may already exists in page 62234 of this forum, but yay... I dedicate my virtual life to Kerbal Rocketry and I need the answer not Soon but NOW ! :)

I'm looking for a part - but not just a part - but the best part ! Which is:

- What is, according to you, the best CARGO BAY? Where can I find it?

If possible... a not-shuttle-restricted cargo bay... a sweet cargo bay that can be part of a rocket with a lot of beautiful BOASTERS... yes.

Yes but to transport what kind of stuff? My imagination is large... whatever, dead kerbals, boasters, roasted struts, kerbalky fried LV-N, useful and useless stuff.

I would be really happy to read your suggestions ! Thanks mate(s) !

Pall.

Edited April 9, 2014 by Palleas
SpaceJunk cargo bays and/or B9 Aerospace pack are your answer!
Thou art a brave man, thou Biker Joe ! Thx !

If you need a cargo bay for a rocket-based craft, I'd suggest DaMichels' Parts pack. The SpaceJunk bay is also good and provides more clearance from the doors, but personally I like the aforementioned better for it's design similarities with FusTek/SumGhai parts. Plus it's more modular and somewhat more inline.

If you need a cargo bay for a rocket-based craft, I'd suggest DaMichels' Parts pack. The SpaceJunk bay is also good and provides more clearance from the doors, but personally I like the aforementioned better for it's design similarities with FusTek/SumGhai parts. Plus it's more modular and somewhat more inline.

Oh thanks! This mod looks awesome ! Does it work with .23.5? I would be pleased to try it if it does !

Oh thanks! This mod looks awesome ! Does it work with .23.5? I would be pleased to try it if it does !

Yes, it works with .23.5
FASA also has a cargo bay, as does Lack Luster Labs (Theirs is even a drop bay/elevator type thing)

Well, thank you guys !

To make this post a little bit more useful, here's the link to the Cargobay's mod you suggested !

Let's call this the cargobay paradise

- DaMichel's part pack

- B9 Aerospace pack and the fix for .23.5 that you can find in the forum here

- Space Junk Cargo bay (I don't know if there's compatibiliy issues)

- FASA

- Lack Luster Labs

If you're looking for cargobay, as I was, you may find everything here !

BUT I want to clarify a point: I AM NOT A cargobay FETICHIST Keep that in mind or I'll send you far beyond Eeloo with a half ion engine and a classical pod.

Edited April 11, 2014 by Palleas
